title: University Management System
description: A group project where we build .NET application to issue degree, issue ID cards, give and view feedback, Lost and Found, Academic plan etc. ~ Contributed by Hareem and Yahya

title: The Quest for the Crystal Kingdom
description: This game is an exciting text based adventure game where the player embarks on a perilous journey to retrieve a legendary crystal from a dangerous and enchanted forest

title: Glaucoma Detection using ML and unsupervised Segmentation
description: This is a project uses Fundus Images and masks to detect Glaucoma patients and train ML model using U-Net architecture .
